Previent MD, LLC is a spin-off of High Voltage Interactive, a 15 year old Digital strategic marketing company.  We connect physicians, patients and consumers via an innovative social media centric, preventive health and wellness ecosystem, with a focus on Health Optimization Medicine.Our ecosystem is designed to disrupt the current model of preventive healthcare. In our view Health Optimization Medicine is the vanguard of authentic preventive care. It is clinically and scientifically proven to improve patient outcomes through the synergies of diagnostics, diet & nutrition, exercise & fitness, hormone balance, stress management, supplementation, and cognitive reinforcement via preventive, regenerative and precision medicine. Leveraging technology, we help physicians and their patients adopt behavioral change for health & wellness planning.  We provide our members with healthful learning outcomes, integrating member data feedback loops, data analytics and empirical research to help members achieve the best possible results for health, wellness and longevity. Our services support physician private practices, with all-inclusive training, marketing, management and administrative services. We enable physicians to invest more valuable and meaningful time with patients, improving the quality of life for both. Our network is designed to support our audience with in-depth, integrated personalized preventive care - content, context, tools, products and services with access to peer to peer, and peer to professional social engagement, in a network of vetted private physicians, providers and services.   We look forward to working towards the goal of creating a healthier lifestyle for everyone who comes in contact with us.

High Voltage Interactive was a 'garage' start-up and within five years became an emerging company in the top five category, providing online marketing services to post secondary schools.  We worked with over 150 for-profit career, vocational and technical schools.  Our success was based on delivering a high level of innovative services to our clients. All of our technology and creative developments were proprietary.  Our clients appreciated our devotion to providing stellar client service.   By the end of our fifth year in business, we built up to a team of 20 employees and we tracked $12 million in revenue.  The Education Division was sold to Aptimus in August 2006 for a 40X return on invested equity. In late 2007, Aptimus became part of the Apollo Group.

WLN's overall mission is to provide a high-quality career development and planning knowledge base linked to educational opportunities that supports and empowers individuals to create career plans that leads to lifelong learning. We present a long term comprehensive source for tools, resources and community interaction to make lifelong learning and career development a way of life for our members. This creates significant long term value for participants, partners and investors.A variety of resources to achieve personal growth and financial well-being are provided by WLN, including assessment tests, ‚Äúvoices from the field,‚Äù online career counseling, self-paced, self-help learning tools, online courses, and/or classroom learning opportunities.WLN's community forum offers its audience innovative methods and tools to communicate with career experts, assess career interests and abilities, and access information such as growth industries, degree programs, career advice and live guidance to help its audience achieve their life goals. These resources help individuals develop a career roadmap and coordinate educational requirements and opportunities to achieve career growth and life fulfillment.

We develop Internet ideas, research viability, angel fund it, develop prototypical platforms, and then seek investor funding to take the verticals to market. We are currently working on two ventures, one as a site for budding entrepreneurs, the other in the career education sector.  Both are very timely given the current economic impediment people are dealing with.

As a part of key management team, project responsibilities were to reinforce Operations & Administration, Sales & Marketing, Client Service, Finance, Creative, Media and Technology.* Developed and led the execution of a comprehensive operational planning strategy* Developed efficiencies in overall operations across both Affiliate Marketing and Marketing Services divisions* Created new income revenue stream opportunities* Created and implemented process for sales forecasts, an operating budget & plan for growth and profitability of the company  * Staff supervision led to a more efficient organizational structure* Oversight of company financials resulted in significant expense reduction * Developed M&A exit strategy* Improved customer relationship management processes* Developed comprehensive compensation plan for all staff

summary: * Serial entrepreneur and visionary pioneer in coalescing 'ahead-of-the-curve' concepts into lucrative business models * Extensive experience in developing and working with great teams who share vision and passion* Talented in developing and executing operational plans that deliver successful outcomes* A knack for integrating advertising and marketing, brand building, client services, business development, technology, financial modeling, and business planning that catapults companies to success  * Strategic development of innovative strategies that out-perform top-tier competitors* Proven track record in building brand perception in moving prospects along the purchase/retention/advocacy cycle* Developer of ground-breaking usability web concepts that consistently elevate brand consideration and immersion against top-tier competitors  * Support large-scale solutions for database design, development and management* Develop high-yield return on investment and long-term customer value methodologies resulting in increased customer interaction and higher retention ratesSpecialties: * Visionary empiricist* Strategic architect for building startups* Brand-Direct response expert* Expert at syndication development * Writer, speaker on various Internet topics
